overview: A story about Estelito who went to the province to hunt game, after the hunt he went swimming but upon his return, all his belonging were gone.  He then went searching and meets Pilar the person who kept his belongings, after their meeting Estelito goes back to the metro. One day Pilar's grandfather returns from America and opts for Pilar and her family to stay and live with him in the metro.
title: Galawgaw
